sen.j: 鵜塚（うづか）は、岐阜県岐阜市にある長良川鵜飼の鵜を供養するための慰霊碑である。
sen.e: Uzuka is a monument located in Gifu City, Gifu Prefecture that was constructed for the repose of cormorants of Nagara-gawa ukai (cormorant fishing in Nagara-gawa river).
Uzuka is a monument located in Gifu City, Gifu Prefecture that was constructed for the repose of cormorants of Nagara-gawa ukai (cormorant fishing in Nagara-gawa River).
Uzuka is a monument located in Gifu City, Gifu Prefecture that was constructed for the repose of cormorants of Nagara-gawa ukai (cormorant fishing in Nagara-gawa River).

sen.j: 鵜匠による鵜の供養自体は百数十年前より行われていたが、1983年（昭和58年）10月16日に鵜飼関係者の浄財により長良宮口町に塚が建立された。
sen.e: The memorial service for cormorants has been held by ujo (a fisherman of cormorant fishing) for more than a hundred years, and a monument was constructed on October 16, 1983 in Nagara-miyaguchi-cho thanks to the contribution by ukai related people.

The memorial service for cormorants has been held by usho (a fisherman of cormorant fishing) for more than a hundred years, and a monument was constructed on October 16, 1983 in Nagara Miyaguchi-cho thanks to the contribution by ukai related people.
sen.cmt: Ushoに訂正しました。Nagara Miyaguchi-choに訂正しました。
sen.e: The memorial service for cormorants has been held by usho (a fisherman of cormorant fishing) for more than a hundred years, and a monument was constructed on October 16, 1983 in Nagara Miyaguchi-cho thanks to the contribution by ukai related people.

sen.j: 2003年（平成15年）3月の長良古津橋線道路整備に絡み2004年に現在の地に移転されている。
sen.e: It was shifted to the current place in 2004 due to the construction of Nagara-Furutsubashi Route in March 2003.
It was shifted to the current place in 2004 due to the construction of Nagara Furutsu-bashi Route in March 2003.
It was shifted to the current place in 2004 due to the construction of Nagara Furutsu-bashi Route in March 2003.

sen.j: 毎年、長良川鵜飼終了後の最初の日曜日に、鵜飼関係者等により鵜供養が営まれる。
sen.e: Memorial service for cormoramts is held every year by ukai related people on the first Sunday after ukai season ended.
Memorial service for cormorants is held every year by ukai related people on the first Sunday after Nagara-gawa ukai season ended.
sen.cmt: cormorantsスペル訂正しました。Nagara-gawa 補足しました。
sen.e: Memorial service for cormorants is held every year by ukai related people on the first Sunday after Nagara-gawa ukai season ended.

sen.j: 岐阜県岐阜市長良大前町1丁目
